en-US.summary: What parents need to know about a movie.
examplePhrases: Alexa ask movie guide about rogue one
Alexa get review about despicable me 3 from movie guide
en-US.name: Movie Guide
en-US.description: Parents can find out what content isn't only age-appropriate but also developmentally appropriate for their child. Ask Movie Guide for the review from commonsensemedia.org.
